newsitem.title: USA: Shaw Group says union members on strike.
newsitem.headline: Shaw Group says union members on strike.

text.p: Shaw Group Inc on Wednesday said some members of Local 198 of the Union Association of Journeymen and Apprentices of the Plumbing and Pipefitting Industry were out on strike.

The job action came amid an impasse over renewals of collective bargaining agreements covering the company's Sunland Fabricators Inc subsidiary in Walker, La. and its National Fabricators Inc. subsidiary in Prairieville, La., the company said.
Operations continue at both facilities despite the strike, Shaw Group said.

Shaw Group said the collective bargaining agreements between the company's subsidiaries and the union, which were to have expired on December 31, 1996. The union terminated an extension of the deal, effective February 5.
The number of union members participating in the strike was not immediately available.
The company is a fabricator of piping systems.
